document_title: Gastritis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: viem-da-day.json_6_When do you need to see a doctor?
subsection_content: Acute gastritis can go away on its own without treatment, or with treatment to reduce acid secretion. Although acute gastritis is not a dangerous disease, it can also cause gastrointestinal bleeding. Therefore, seeing a doctor is necessary when symptoms do not improve after adjusting diet and lifestyle
